questions.question: What is the dominant color of the upholstery fabric covering the entire seating area?
What is the overarching shape of the backrest, specifically its curvature at the top?
Describe the texture of the upholstery fabric; is it smooth or does it have a discernible pattern?
What is the primary material used for the visible legs supporting the seating unit?
Considering the backrest's design, what type of button tufting pattern is predominantly present?
What is the overall style of this piece of furniture, suggesting its intended use or aesthetic?
Characterize the color of the visible wooden legs supporting the furniture; light or dark?
What is the primary construction material of the main seating area and backrest?
Considering its size and design, what is the probable function of this furniture piece?
What is the visible overall shape and style of this furniture piece; is it angular or curved?
Describe the visual finish of the wooden legs; are they glossy or matte?
What is the approximate number of visible legs supporting the furniture's weight?
Is the seat's depth consistent throughout, or does it feature any noticeable curves or variations?
Considering the overall size, how many people could comfortably sit on this furniture?
What kind of stitching pattern is visible in the upholstery near the seams?
